```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis"}
class_name <- .doc_topic()
field_or_arg_name <- knitr::opts_current$get(".doc_arg_name")

child_name <-
    tryCatch(
        normalizePath(paste0("class-", class_name, "-", field_or_arg_name, ".Rmd"), mustWork = TRUE),
        error = function(e) {
            normalizePath(paste0("class-x-", field_or_arg_name, ".Rmd"), mustWork = TRUE)
        }
    )

knitr::asis_output(
    c(
        knitr::knit_child(
            child_name,
            options = list(.doc_class_name = class_name, doc_tag = field_or_arg_name)
        )
    )
)
```
